rules_text:
Hexproof
[i]Trickster's Form[/i] – You may have Loki, The Trickster enter as a copy of any creature on the battlefield or any creature card in a graveyard, except her name is still Loki, The Trickster and still has all abilities of Loki.
[i]Ruse[/i] – {B}{B}, Discard a card: Until end of turn, target creature you control becomes a copy of any creature on the battlefield or any creature card in a graveyard, except they keep their name.
